WorkPlace.Name: PETER SKOV JOHANSEN
WorkPlace.Description: GreenPeas is the main producer of fresh hand-picked peas sold as snack on the European market. GreenPeas is a Danish company operating in different European countries, mainly in Denmark, Portugal, Italy and Germany. The peas are picked by hand by 300 - 400 persons in the period March-September.

The peas are picked by hand by 300 - 400 persons in the period March-September.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: GreenPeas is the main producer of fresh hand picked peas sold as snack on the European market. GreenPeas is a Danish company operating in different European countries, mainly in Denmark, Portugal, Italy and Germany. The peas are picked by hand by 300 - 400 persons in the period March-September.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you enjoy working outdoors and are you ready to roll up your sleeves and give it a go to take care of the fresh green peas in the southern part of Portugal between Comporta and Odemira – if yes, then this might be the right position for you.

The Danish agricultural company, GreenPeas A/S is looking for a self-sufficient and independent operating tractor driver to take care of the fields in Portugal to produce fresh hand-picked peas. 

The production is carried out and controlled in multiple steps over the year, to have fresh peas available all the time, no matter the weather and soil condition.

About the role

It is a pioneer work, and the production must be set up and carried out in connection with the production in other countries, especially with the main production in Denmark. 

Traveling for work in Denmark or to other countries for different periods to exchange experiences, contribute to different high seasons, and be aligned with the production concept of the company must be expected.

Responsibilities:

- Manage and take care of the practical field operation in coordination with the agricultural engineer.

- Take care of the field equipment (operation, maintenance, repairs).

- Participate in the harvesting season with transportation, loading/unloading pallets, technical support, etc.

Requirements:

- Self-sufficient and proactive working.

- Professional operating of most kinds of agricultural/horticultural types of equipment.

- Flair for self-sufficient maintenance and repairs.

- Tractor and truck driving license.

- Spraying and forklift certificate.

- Linguistically proficient in English.

Personal profile:

- Proactive with a high level of self-control and mental strength.

- Strong will to pursue goals without limitation from traditional thinking.

- Open-minded and committed.

- Positive and accepting view of life and humanity.

To apply for this position, the candidates don’t need to know about pea production, but practical and professional knowledge about general field operations and crop processing must be possessed. It is important to be flexible and independent working, and able to make own planning following the cultivation needs in a responsible way.

We offer:

- International team of young, ambitious people who are all trying to make a difference from a visionary perspective.

- Opportunity to grow with the task and develop personal and professional skills.

- Flexible travel and accommodation arrangements.

- A workplace in rapid development.

- A flat and informal organization where there are high expectations for quality and results.

- A job where no two days are alike and the aims are high. 

Salary depends on the skills and the value created for the company.

Job starts as soon as possible.

Interviews will be conducted continuously, so we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible. If you have any questions, you are welcome to ask by e-mail to aam@greenpeas.dk or by phone to Andreea Anamaria Motoc +45 51101097

Application, including CV, must be sent in the English language by e-mail to work@greenpeas.dk with the subject “Farm operator- Portugal” as soon as possible.
